nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class HitsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.HitsWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Hit>

    public class HitsWindow
extends Hits
    Represents a subset of a Hits object, for example a page of hits.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HitsWindow

        @Deprecated
public HitsWindow(Hits source,
                     int first,
                     int windowSize)
        Deprecated. use Hits.window(first, windowSize).
        Construct a HitsWindow object. NOTE: this method will be made package-private in a future release. Use Hits.window() to construct a HitsWindow instead.
        Parameters:
        source - the larger Hits object we would like a window into
        first - the first hit in our window
        windowSize - the size of our window

    • Method Detail

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Are there more hits in the original Hits object beyond our window?
        Returns:
        true if there are, false if not.

      • hasPrevious

        public boolean hasPrevious()
        Are there more hits in the original Hits object "to the left" of our window?
        Returns:
        true if there are, false if not.

      • nextFrom

        public int nextFrom()
        Where would the next window start?
        Returns:
        index of the first hit beyond our window

      • prevFrom

        public int prevFrom()
        Where would the previous window start?
        Returns:
        index of the start hit for the previous page

        What's the first in the window?
